lead_paragraph: Aston Villa manager Remi Garde called for unity after supporters walked out early during Tuesday's 3-1 defeat by Everton that pushed the former European champions closer to relegation.

headline.print_headline: Garde Calls for Crumbling Villa to Stick Together
headline.main: Garde Calls for Crumbling Villa to Stick Together

snippet: Aston Villa manager Remi Garde called for unity after supporters walked out early during Tuesday's 3-1 defeat by Everton that pushed the former European champions closer to relegation....
